躲.definition: to hide; to dodge; to avoid

躲不起.definition: can't avoid; can't hide from; unavoidable

躲年.definition: to avoid going home for the Chinese New Year (for any of various reasons: because one finds the festivities onerous in some way, or because it would be seen as inauspicious for one to attend, or, in former times, to avoid creditors, since it was the custom to have debts settled before New Year's Day, and once into the New Year, debtors got a reprieve)

躲得過初一，躲不過十五.pinyin: duo3 de5 guo4 chu1 yi1 , duo3 bu4 guo4 shi2 wu3
躲得過初一，躲不過十五.definition: lit. you may go undetected during the new moon, but at full moon you'll be found out (idiom); fig. you can't put it off forever; sooner or later you'll have to deal with it

躲懶.definition: to shy away from work; to get by without attending duty

躲清閑.definition: to avoid external disturbance in order to idle

躲窮.definition: to take refuge with a rich relative

躲藏.definition: to conceal oneself; to go into hiding; to take cover

躲讓.definition: to step aside (for a passing vehicle); to get out of the way; to make way for

躲躲閃閃.definition: to evade; to dodge (out of the way)

躲過初一，躲不過十五.pinyin: duo3 guo4 chu1 yi1 , duo3 bu4 guo4 shi2 wu3
躲過初一，躲不過十五.definition: see 躲得過初一，躲不過十五|躲得过初一，躲不过十五[duo3 de5 guo4 chu1 yi1 , duo3 bu4 guo4 shi2 wu3]

躲避.definition: to hide; to evade; to dodge; to take shelter; to avoid (difficulties)

躲閃.definition: to evade; to dodge (out of the way)

躲開.definition: to stay out of (hot water, trouble, awkward situation etc); to avoid (sb)

躲難.definition: to take refuge; to seek refuge from disaster

躲雨.definition: to take shelter from the rain

躲風.definition: lit. to avoid the wind; fig. to keep low to avoid a difficult situation; to stay out of trouble
